LanguageData.BB_EagleOwl.label: eagle owl
LanguageData.BB_EagleOwl.description: One of the largest species of owl, the eagle-owl has characteristic ear tufts, orange eyes and an 'Uhu' call that makes it instantly recognisable. Due to its large size, it can take a wide variety of prey but typically favours small mammals and birds.
LanguageData.BB_EagleOwl.tools.talons.label: talons
LanguageData.BB_EagleOwl.tools.beak.label: beak
LanguageData.BB_EagleOwl.tools.head.label: head
